features: [Extendable Pole Design]- The optional extension pole makes the broom length from 34 to 51 inches, People can choose the appropriate length according to their height. NO MORE BENDING!
[Soft 4 Layer Angle Broom Bristles] High quality broom with bristle construction that will not absorb water, more dense and durable. Eco-friendly fiber made from recycled PET bottles.
[High Quality]- Made from premium quality, durable ABS materials, it can be used as a kitchen, home, office or lobby floor, broom and dustpan combo for quick and easy cleaning. Make your life easier.

[Dustpan Teeth and Flush Lip]- Double-sided Comb Teeth for easy to scrape off the hair and rubbish into dustpan, no need to drag by hand, easy to clean human hair, pet dog hair and dust on the broom; a flush lip that fits the ground neatly so dust is not swept underneath it.
[Compact Stand-up Storage]- Just clip the broom to the dustpan handle to store in your stand up cleaning cabinet. Plus, you can also hang it up to make it even more space efficient!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Long Handled Broom and Dust Pan Set 51 inch long handle broom and large-capacity dustpan perfect for sweeping and long handle allow you to stand upright for comfortable sweeping. You don’t need bending to sweep. It can be used to clean the ceiling. Say goodbye to littering and dusty This dustpan has a lid can keep garbage in the dustpan, it's helpful to reduce / stop the garbage, dust goes out from dustpan and odor emission. Multi-scene Application This long handle broom and dustpan set is ideal for kitchen, hall, office, warehouse, garage, barber shop, entrance, balcony or hardwood floor, indoor and outdoor. It also can be used as kids cleaning set. What a miracle broom.

45-DEGREE BRISTLES SWEEP This broom and dustpan set comes with 4 layers of high quality bristles, which cleans the floor more efficiently. With 45 degree angle design, it is easy to clean corners. ADVANCED LOCK DESIGN The dustpan lock in open position has been improved, now it is easy to stand up without difficulty. It ensures the dustpan and broom upright for perfect space-saving! MICRO-CURVED DESIGN Designed with micro curve on the dust pan, it conforms to surfaces so dust is not swept underneath it, for maximum pickup. Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth Built in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy to Clean Broom into Dustpan , Clean Pet Hair and Human Hair with one Pull on the Teeth. The rubber lip of the dust pan is flush with the floor and the teeth clean out the bristles easily.

All in One Set Broom Our Floor Sweeping Brooms with Lid that can keep the garage in the dustpan and prevent dust fly out from dustpan, sweeping broom and dustpan can be folded together that the brooms can be stand-up storage and save space. Optional extension pole The length of this kitchen broom and dustpan can be adjusted from 36 to 50 inches. Parents keep comfortable while cleaning without bending the waist. Small broom and dustpan for kids lobby floor use. Clip on Broom and Dustpan Combo The clip-on feature makes the dustpan and broom upright a perfect space safer! Just clip the broom to the dustpan handle to store in your stand up cleaning cabinet. Plus, you can also hang it up to make it even more space efficient.

Compact Storage The broom and dustpan are easily snap together for stand up or hand up, the perforated broom handle fits for hang on a hook on the wall. A Quick Touch Up Sweeping Offer you a quick pick up sweeping than vac or sweeper Attach firmly to floor The rubber lip is flexible which ensures the dust DO NOT go under neath

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is it weird that I love my broom so much?
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the same dust mop for 10 years, since it has a washable head, I felt virtuous that I wasn't throwing away brooms or swiffer heads. Except, it really didn't work that well at all. We have ceramic tile floors in the bathrooms and that dang thing was useless.I purchased one of these cheerful little brooms because I was soooooo pissed off at all the cat litter and dust and hair everywhere during the pandemic. Stuff I love:The color.The handle is a great length, no bending over.When I sweep a quiet room, it makes a delicate ASMR sound that is really aesthetically pleasing.It works really ding-dang well. Like, it just really works.BeSt Of ALLLLLLLL -- the teeth that clean the bristles on the dust pan work soooooooooooooo well, it's just a delight. And I am not that type of person. Like, it's so satisfying to sweep up all the crap, and then sweep it neatly into the dustpan, and then scrape all the giant furballs off onto the comb, and then take a toilet paper and wipe the remaining crud off the comb. I have never done this in my whole life, but, I've taken to actually cleaning the dustpan because I like it so much I want it to be clean. And that's WEIRD.The only con is that the dustpan is a tad finicky so there is a bit of finesse to getting the shmutz into the dustpan.I liked it so much I bought one for upstairs and one for downstairs.It does feel a little flimsy but so far no breakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and functional!
reviews.reviewText: I love this broom and dustpan! I'm a black and purple fan and was thrilled to find this set. They are light weight but sturdy enough and work perfectly on my hardwood floors and kitchen linoleum. The rubber lip on the dustpan is a nice feature. Both were super easy to assemble and fit easily in any corner. Recommend if you need an indoor broom and dustpan that gets the job done but is a bit cuter than most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, does the job well
reviews.reviewText: It is a great concept and works well. For the price, however, I thought it was a bit flimsy. I would like to see it cheaper. The broom connects to the pan but if not in a certain position, it will fall over. I do love the purple color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does a great job
reviews.reviewText: Subscribing to the "never bring an old broom into a new home" superstition, I bought this combo set (actually, I really did because it's purple). The rubber lip on the dustpan does a great job on my wooden floor ensuring everything gets swept into it and not under it.Easy to assemble and lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This Broom Not the best
reviews.reviewText: This broom is not the best, The dust pan does not drop and fold up with ease you have to use your foot or your hands to sometimes get it to work. The dust will often times go under the ledge of the dustpan. The broom is flimsy it sweeps up string well. But if you need to sweep anything more then sewing madness it would be useless. so giving this broom 3 out 5 stars.> because I do like that it is purple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Broom and dustpan
reviews.reviewText: The broom and dustpan are good quality broom and dustpan great for small spaces or small cleanups very easy to use it easiest store

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like my broom set. It is flat to the floor, so I don't leave dirt behind. I like the broom cleaner on the dustpan. Only dislike is the handle keeps moving around. I can't seem to tighten it enough to stop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this set,love the color! Easy to use & put together
